Summary: Clearly defined bright white ball moving very quickly straight down behind mountains.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Accord
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details this is verbatum as told to me. while traveling south on route 209 we saw this very large bright white ball with clearly defined edges and no tail or trail dive straight down behind the mountains(i presume the shawangunk mtns....) the witnesses, a married couple that live in the area, said it was "the size of a tennis ball in your hand" in other words, pretty big. i have known these people for many years. they are pillars of the community and not prone to exageration or flights of fancy. they reported this to me only after i had e-mailed them of my sighting on the morning of 6\10\08 east of rhinebeck. sincerely, rjw pres. ufosa
